overview: The main island of Okinawa, full of history and nature, is filmed with the Inspire 2, a professional drone manufactured by DJI, and a gimbal camera with a Super 35mm sensor. Enjoy the colorful and spectacular views of Cape Kyanabu, Hyakuna Beach, Cape Hendo, and more.
title: Soratabi Okinawa - Iyashi Drone Sightseeing
